features: Audio Recording, Blink Detection technology, Face Detection, Image Stabilisation, Not Interchangeable Lenses, Red-eye Correction, Smile Detection technology, Touch Screen, USB 2.0, camera orientation detection, digital image rotation, face zoom, face-priority AF function, in-camera red-eye fix

supportedflashmemory: Built-in, SD Card, SD Memory Card, SDHC Card, SDHC Memory Card
